top.title: Police issue arrest warrant for suspect in Brown University attack, sources say
top.summary: Investigators are also searching for a car they believe was rented by the suspect in the shooting that killed two students and injured nine.

top.title: Violence breaks out in Bangladesh after death of youth protest leader
top.summary: Sharif Osman Hadi was a prominent figure in the movement that ousted former prime minister Sheik Hasina.

top.title: Ex-Nascar driver and his family among seven killed in US plane crash
top.summary: Officials confirmed Greg Biffle, his wife and two children were among those who boarded the small plane that crashed at a regional airport in North Carolina.

top.title: TikTok owner signs agreements to avoid US  ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.

top.title: £100 contactless card limit to be lifted
top.summary: Card providers can decide whether to offer unlimited payments on contactless cards.

title.#text: TikTok ban: all the news on the app’s shutdown and return in the US
The TikTok US sale is finally happening
Threads wants to be the app you can’t wait to open in the morning
